verbs.description: Half an hour before President Donald Trump [V: was] set to speak at his Nashville rally at Municipal Auditorium , the second tier of the stadium was all but empty .
Half an hour before [ARG0: President Donald Trump] was set to [V: speak] [ARGM-LOC: at his Nashville rally at Municipal Auditorium] , the second tier of the stadium was all but empty .
[ARGM-TMP: Half an hour before President Donald Trump was set to speak at his Nashville rally at Municipal Auditorium] , [ARG1: the second tier of the stadium] [V: was] [ARG2: all but empty] .
